snippet.title: Introducing Metrico for PSVita
snippet.description:
Metrico is the upcoming puzzle action game from Digital Dreams and will be exclusive for PS Vita. Metrico revolves around a unique infographic world with lots of atmosphere and utilizes the unique PS Vita-enabled controls in a new way.

Watch @DigitalDreams_ or www.facebook.com/MetricoGame for updates, or visit www.metrico-game.com.
